newsitem.title: SLOVENIA: SLOVENE DOLENJSKA BANKA H1 PROFIT UP.
newsitem.headline: SLOVENE DOLENJSKA BANKA H1 PROFIT UP.

text.p: Slovenia's Dolenjska Banka said on Friday its pre-tax profit in the first half of 1997 rose seven percent to 286.5 million tolars ($1.66 million) from 267.7 million in the same period last year.
Total assets increased to 53.8 billion tolars from 53.2 billion at the end of the last year and from 43.1 billion in the end of June of 1996, the bank said in its statement.
No-one at the bank was immediately available to give further details.

At 1045 GMT Dolenjska's ordinary shares were up by 110 tolars to 15,210 tolars on volume of 272 shares, while preferred shares rose 350 tolars or 2.52 percent to 14,250 tolars on volume of 20 shares. -- Novica Mihajlovic, LJubljana newsroom, 386-61-125-8439 ($=172.4 Slovenian Tolars)
